column2: Appart Mons City Concept - Terrasse & Grand-Place
column3: The apartment has a wonderful balcony and a large living room. Great for business travelers or a couple on holiday. Close to the city center, with plenty of cafes and shops within 5 minutes walking.

column2: Appart Mons City Concept - Terrasse & Grand-Place
column3: Spotless, comfortable, perfect location and very friendly hosts. I highly recommend this place.

column2: Appart Mons City Concept - Terrasse & Grand-Place
column3: The apartment is true to the pictures. Very conveniently located.

column2: Appart Mons City Concept - Terrasse & Grand-Place
column3: Everything were perfect  There was everything we were looking for at home. I would definitely recommend

column2: Appart Mons City Concept - Terrasse & Grand-Place
column3: Everything, from check in to check out and all of the bits in between. It was beautiful weather so made use of the terrace.

column2: Appart Mons City Concept - Terrasse & Grand-Place
column3: Fantastic location and stylish interior matched by high level of comfort.

column2: Appart Mons City Concept - Terrasse & Grand-Place
column3:
Great appartment in the city center. Well renovated, beautifull terrace with the sun at the end of the day. 
Even Dutch TV with all the biggest movie channels.
Lovend it!!
